primary.description: Color for headers on a light background

secondary.description: Color for descriptions and subtitles on a light background

tertiary.description: Color for third line information on a light background

primary.description: Color for headers on a dark background

secondary.description: Color for descriptions and subtitles on a dark background

tertiary.description: Color for third line information on a dark background

danger.description: Color for the error title and description

success.description: Color for the confirmation header and description

warning.description: Color for the warning header and description

prize.description: Color for highlighting prizes and the amount of balances and free spins

primary.description: Used for the active icon on a dark background

secondary.description: used for a secondary icon on a dark background

tertiary.description: Used for a disabled icon on a dark background

primary.description: Used for the active icon on a light background

secondary.description: used for a secondary icon on a light background

tertiary.description: Used for a disabled icon on a light background

danger.description: Used for an error icon or badge

primary.description: Used as a background for the background of the main pages, and bottom sheet

card.description: Used for the default state of the card

01.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Beginner”

02.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Bronze”

03.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Silver”

04.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Gold”

05.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Platinum”

06.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Diamond”

07.description: Used for the background of the loyalty program status for “Super VIP”

current.description: Color is used for current balance

bonus.description: Color is used for bonus balance

points.description: Color is used for points balance

сashback.description: Color is used for сashback balance

savings.description: Color is used for savings balance

real.description: Color is used for real balance

primary.description: Used for the active border on a dark background

secondary.description: used for a secondary border on a dark background

tertiary.description: Used for a disabled border on a dark background

primary.description: Used for the active border on a light background

secondary.description: used for a secondary border on a light background

tertiary.description: Used for a disabled border on a light background

story.description: Used for active and new stories that the user has not yet viewed

auxiliary.description: Used to highlight the active step the user is on

default.description: Field text used for the background

cursor.description: Used for the cursor when focusing with a text field

value.description: The color is used for the written text

label.description: The color used for the label of the field text

right-Icon.description: The color for the active icon and the one you can interact with

left-icon.description: Default icon on the level and cannot be interacted with

success.description: For an icon that shows success

danger.description: For an icon that shows errors

warning.description: For an icon that shows warnings

focused.description: The root of interaction with the text field
